resources.string: Dear user we need permission to access your precise location both in foreground and background. We need your precise location to capture what is the mobile signal strength at your location. Please note that no information related to your identity is captured. The data captured can never be backtracked to your identity.
Dear user we need background permission to access your precise location all the time. We need your location in background to capture the mobile signal strength at your location every 15 mins.

Dear user without permission of location, this application won\'t work. So please rethink and give the permission again. Or else you can install application for the time being and reconsider later. Please contact at @string/my_email for further doubts.

Dear User, 
 Thanks for downloading the application. This application is developed by Director(National Broadband Mission), Department of Telecommunications, Government of India, as a pilot program to capture ground level signal strength crowdsourcing. 
 The application tries to captures following data every 15 minutes:
1. Network signal strength
2. Mobile cell parameters
3. Your precise location both in foreground and background.
4. The brand and hardware of your phone.
Please be sure that no parameter related to your identity is captured. The data captured can never be tracked back to your identity ever.
